languages.text: {n}Соломон прищуривается и зло цедит.{/n} "Ты совершила две ошибки — покусилась на человека, который мне важен, и облекла это в оскорбительные для Адептус Арбитес декорации. Поэтому обещаю — как только все это закончится, я возьму тебя за глотку, приставлю к голове дробовик и совершу Его правосудие".

{n}Solomorne narrows his eyes and bites out,{/n} "You've made two mistakes — you attacked someone I care about, and you dressed it up in decorations offensive to the Adeptus Arbites. So I promise you — as soon as this is over, I will take you by the throat, put a shotgun to your head, and do His justice."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон прищуривается и зло цедит.{/n} "Ты совершила две ошибки — покусилась на человека, который мне важен, и облекла это в оскорбительные для Адептус Арбитес декорации. Поэтому обещаю — как только все это закончится, я возьму тебя за глотку, приставлю к голове дробовик и совершу Его правосудие".

So I promise you — as soon as this is over, I will take you by the throat, put a shotgun to your head, and do His justice."

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Augen verengen sich zu Schlitzen und er schnaubt:{/n} "Ihr habt zwei Fehler gemacht ... Ihr habt jemanden angegriffen, der mir am Herzen liegt, und versucht, es dem Adeptus Arbites in die Schuhe zu schieben. Deshalb verspreche ich Euch ... sobald das hier vorbei ist, werde ich Euch an der Kehle packen, Euch eine Waffe an den Kopf setzen und Seiner Gerechtigkeit Genüge tun."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne narrows his eyes and bites out,{/n} "You've made two mistakes — you attacked someone I care about, and you dressed it up in decorations offensive to the Adeptus Arbites. So I promise you — as soon as this is over, I will take you by the throat, put a shotgun to your head, and do His justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Augen verengen sich zu Schlitzen und er schnaubt:{/n} "Ihr habt zwei Fehler gemacht ... Ihr habt jemanden angegriffen, der mir am Herzen liegt, und versucht, es dem Adeptus Arbites in die Schuhe zu schieben. Deshalb verspreche ich Euch ... sobald das hier vorbei ist, werde ich Euch an der Kehle packen, Euch eine Waffe an den Kopf setzen und Seiner Gerechtigkeit Genüge tun."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne plisse les yeux et continue avec acharnement :{/n} « Vous avez commis deux erreurs : vous avez attaqué quelqu'un qui m'est cher et maquillé vos actes en affronts à l'Adeptus Arbites. Voilà donc la promesse que je vous fais : dès que cette histoire sera réglée, je vous saisirai par la gorge, braquerai un fusil contre votre tempe et appliquerai la justice de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne narrows his eyes and bites out,{/n} "You've made two mistakes — you attacked someone I care about, and you dressed it up in decorations offensive to the Adeptus Arbites. So I promise you — as soon as this is over, I will take you by the throat, put a shotgun to your head, and do His justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne plisse les yeux et continue avec acharnement :{/n} « Vous avez commis deux erreurs : vous avez attaqué quelqu'un qui m'est cher et maquillé vos actes en affronts à l'Adeptus Arbites. Voilà donc la promesse que je vous fais : dès que cette histoire sera réglée, je vous saisirai par la gorge, braquerai un fusil contre votre tempe et appliquerai la justice de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは目を細め、かみつくように言い放った。{/n}「お前は二つの過ちを犯した。俺が大切に思う人を攻撃したこと、そして高等裁定局にとって侮辱的な装飾でそれを飾り立てたことだ。だから誓おう。これが終わり次第、お前の喉元をつかみ、頭にショットガンを突きつけて、皇帝陛下の正義を下してやる」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne narrows his eyes and bites out,{/n} "You've made two mistakes — you attacked someone I care about, and you dressed it up in decorations offensive to the Adeptus Arbites. So I promise you — as soon as this is over, I will take you by the throat, put a shotgun to your head, and do His justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは目を細め、かみつくように言い放った。{/n}「お前は二つの過ちを犯した。俺が大切に思う人を攻撃したこと、そして高等裁定局にとって侮辱的な装飾でそれを飾り立てたことだ。だから誓おう。これが終わり次第、お前の喉元をつかみ、頭にショットガンを突きつけて、皇帝陛下の正義を下してやる」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne entrecierra los ojos y masculla:{/n} «Ha cometido dos errores: ha atacado a alguien que me importa y lo ha intentado camuflar con un disfraz ofensivo para el Adeptus Arbites. Por eso le prometo que en cuanto esto termine la agarraré por la garganta, colocaré mi escopeta contra su cabeza y haré cumplir la justicia del Emperador».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne narrows his eyes and bites out,{/n} "You've made two mistakes — you attacked someone I care about, and you dressed it up in decorations offensive to the Adeptus Arbites. So I promise you — as soon as this is over, I will take you by the throat, put a shotgun to your head, and do His justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne entrecierra los ojos y masculla:{/n} «Ha cometido dos errores: ha atacado a alguien que me importa y lo ha intentado camuflar con un disfraz ofensivo para el Adeptus Arbites. Por eso le prometo que en cuanto esto termine la agarraré por la garganta, colocaré mi escopeta contra su cabeza y haré cumplir la justicia del Emperador».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙眯起眼睛，凶狠地咆哮起来。{/n}“你犯了两个错误。你袭击了我在乎的人，还躲在法务部后面，妄图隐瞒罪行。因此，我可以向你保证，等这场审判一结束，我就会掐住你的脖子，用霰弹枪指着你的脑袋，行使神皇的正义。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne narrows his eyes and bites out,{/n} "You've made two mistakes — you attacked someone I care about, and you dressed it up in decorations offensive to the Adeptus Arbites. So I promise you — as soon as this is over, I will take you by the throat, put a shotgun to your head, and do His justice."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, gözlerini kısıp dişlerinin arasından tıslıyor.{/n} "İki hata yaptın: Önemsediğim birine saldırdın ve bu yaptığına Adeptus Arbites'e karşı saldırı süsü verdin. Bu yüzden yeminim olsun... Buradan bir kurtulalım, seni gırtlağından yakalayıp kafana da pompalıyı dayamazsam şerefsizim. Adalet yerini bulacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne narrows his eyes and bites out,{/n} "You've made two mistakes — you attacked someone I care about, and you dressed it up in decorations offensive to the Adeptus Arbites. So I promise you — as soon as this is over, I will take you by the throat, put a shotgun to your head, and do His justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne gözlerini kısıp dişlerinin arasından tıslıyor.{/n} "İki hata yaptın: Önemsediğim birine saldırdın ve bu yaptığına Adeptus Arbites'e karşı saldırı süsü verdin. Bu yüzden ahdim olsun, buradan bir kurtulalım, seni gırtlağından yakalayıp kafana da pompalıyı dayamazsam şerefsizim. Adalet yerini bulacak."
